MajorClaims.MC1: a break of one year is good for young people after finishing their high school
MajorClaims.MC2: a break should be necessarily allowed to young minds between their high school and university studies

Claims.C1: the sole purpose of education is to nurture a young mind and not thrust studies on them
Claims.C2: a break will give students some time to refresh their systems, by traveling or following their hobbies
Claims.C3: Working or traveling for some time, after high school, can help them to find their field of interest
Claims.C4: A break can disturb the focus of students and prove detrimental

Premises.P1: when students start their university studies after a break, they will feel fresh and full of energy to take the new challenge
Premises.P2: A relaxation of one year to young minds will give them a quintessential change
Premises.P3: A continuous study pressure for over 10 years makes the mind saturated and like a robot, to follow instructions
Premises.P4: It will also help them to learn professional setup by working
Premises.P5: Financially, students can save a little money to support their university education by doing a job
Premises.P6: Some students even utilize this time for preparation of their desired university course
Premises.P7: Students can also indulge in smoking or drinking during this time
Premises.P8: When students work during these breaks, the feel of money gives them an illusion that such salary is enough for them and they go in a utopia
Premises.P9: my cousin started working in a customer care centre after high school and got distracted
Premises.P10: When he started his university studies, he failed miserably
Premises.P11: A break gives students more benefits than harms
Premises.P12: It varies from individual to individual, how they utilize that period
